Recruitment.subtitle: Work with excellent people and do interesting things

frontend.title: Front-end Development Engineer
frontend.requirements: 3+ years of front-end development experience|Proficient in React, TypeScript|Good teamwork skills

pm.title: Product Manager
pm.requirements: 5+ years of product experience|Excellent product thinking|Excellent communication skills

introduction.title: Company Profile
introduction.content: We are a leading enterprise focused on technological innovation, committed to providing the highest quality solutions to our customers. Since our establishment, we have always adhered to customer-oriented and technology-driven principles, continuously breaking through ourselves and creating value.

1.name: WBG Technology Co., Ltd
1.description: Focus on technology R&D and innovation

overview.title: Company Overview
overview.content: We are dedicated to providing simplified construction and rapid delivery solutions for data centers. Through our diverse range of modular products—including power, generator sets, IT, cooling, liquid cooling pipelines, and air conditioning—each module is rigorously tested to ensure unparalleled reliability and performance.

history.title: Development History
history.2018: Company established, started data center solutions business
history.2019: Obtained multiple industry certifications, established quality management system
history.2020: Expanded national business network, set up multiple regional service centers
history.2021: Launched new generation of modular data center solutions

vision.title: Vision
vision.content: To become a global leader in data center solutions

ContactUs.title: Contact Us
ContactUs.subtitle: Contact Us
ContactUs.description: Whether you have any questions, need project support, or are interested in joining our team, the WBG team is always ready to help you. Please contact us and we will arrange professional personnel to assist you in achieving your goals.
